description: User requests a markdown‑formatted time‑entry summary for Acme Corp over a specific two‑week period; the assistant calls the generate_summary_report tool and returns the formatted report.

messages.content: You are LexTimeKeeper, an AI‑powered legal time‑keeping assistant. Use the provided tools to parse logs, map activities to billing codes, create time‑sheet entries, and generate reports. Respond in a helpful, concise manner and always include tool calls when needed.
I need a markdown report of all time entries for Acme Corp between 2024-09-01 and 2024-09-15.
Generating the requested summary report for Acme Corp...
